channel.title: Other on Saumya Gaurang Shah
channel.description: Recent content in Other on Saumya Gaurang Shah

item.title: Kritsnam Technologies
item.description: During this internship, I worked with Atlas Scientific pH, Electrical Conductivity (EC), Dissolved Oxygen (DO), and Temperature sensors. After exploring their working and physical principles, I integrated these sensors with Particle Electron Embedded Platform. This was done via mobile data(2G) to retrieve the data for the aforementioned sensors using Atlas Scientific EZO Circuits. Then, using this data, I proposed a regression technique to cut costs by establishing a relationship between the analog signals received from the sensors and their corresponding physical quantity.
